animateVisibility.expression: (((({#1.Out_FwdFB} AND NOT {#1.Out_BwdFB} AND NOT {#1.Out_LoFB}) AND (#3 & 4)) OR (({#1.Out_BwdFB} AND NOT {#1.Out_FwdFB} AND NOT {#1.Out_LoFB}) AND (#3 & 2))) OR (((({#1.Out_FwdFB} AND NOT {#1.Out_BwdFB} AND {#1.Out_LoFB}) AND (#3 & 4)) OR (({#1.Out_BwdFB} AND {#1.Out_LoFB} AND NOT {#1.Out_FwdFB}) AND (#3 & 2))) AND system\BlinkFast))

(((({#1.Out_FwdFB} AND NOT {#1.Out_BwdFB} AND NOT {#1.Out_LoFB}) AND (#3 & 2)) OR (({#1.Out_BwdFB} AND NOT {#1.Out_FwdFB} AND NOT {#1.Out_LoFB}) AND (#3 & 4))) OR (((({#1.Out_FwdFB} AND NOT {#1.Out_BwdFB} AND {#1.Out_LoFB}) AND (#3 & 2)) OR (({#1.Out_BwdFB} AND {#1.Out_LoFB} AND NOT {#1.Out_FwdFB}) AND (#3 & 4))) AND system\BlinkFast))

connection.expression: If {#1.Out_ControllerEnabled} Then If ({#1.Out_SPManMode} Or {#1.Out_CVManMode}) Then 2 Else 1 Else 0
